Get the latest updates delivered to your: Akira amakuru mashya muri email yawe.
dedicated to truthful reporting on the s: twihatira gutanga amakuru y'ukuri ku by'umutekano, ubufasha n'ibya politiki bigira ingaruka ku karere kacu.
a platform for the banyamulenge people t: urubuga rw'Abanyamulenge ngo bavuge inkuru zabo kandi basangire umuco wabo n'isi yose.
Founded in 2024, we started as a simple: Twatangije mu 2024, twatangiriye nk'inyandiko ngufi kugira ngo duhurize ibihe bikomeye by'akarere n'ubushake bw'abaturage bwo gusobanukirwa.
We believe that reliable information is: Twemera ko amakuru yizewe ari ishingiro ry'umuryango ukiranuka. Itsinda ryacu ry'abanyamakuru bo hano rikorana ubwitonzi kugira ngo rigenzure ukuri ku butaka, binyuze ku makuru atari yo n'algorithms.
Have a tip, a correction, or an inquiry?: Ufite icyo utubwira, gukosorwa, cyangwa ikibazo? Dushaka kukumva.
Name: Izina
Imuhira respects your privacy. This poli: Imuhira yubaha ibanga ryawe. Iyi politiki isobanura amakuru dushobora gukusanya kuri wowe.
We collect information by which you may: Dukusanya amakuru akwemeza nka izina n'aderesi ya email igihe wiyandikisha ku makuru yacu.
We use information that we collect about: Dukoresha amakuru dukusanya kukwereka urubuga rwacu no kukugezaho amakuru n'serivisi utusaba.
By accessing this website, you agree to: Mu kwinjira kuri uru rubuga, wemeye kubahiriza aya mategeko n'amabwiriza y'ikoreshwa.
All content published on Imuhira is the: Ibintu byose byashyizweho Imuhira ni ubutaka bwa Imuhira kandi birindwa n'amategeko mpuzamahanga y'uburenganzira bw'umwanditsi.
